sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SINGUMNERE, a district of Hindustan, belonging to the Mahratta Peshwa, in the province of Aurungabad, situated about the 20th degree of north latitude. It is a hilly, but a fertile district. The chief towns are Singumnere, Bat- towal, and Bejapoor. The capital is of the same name. Long. 74. 40. E. Lat. 19. 46. N.
